about_the_game:
QLewds is an upcoming Free-to-Play 3 vs 3 online multiplayer clash in a large 2D arena. The game aims to bridge aspects of MOBAs, Metroidvanias, 2D Platformers, and Brawlers into a novel gaming experience.

Victory is achieved for one team by destroying the enemy's throne. Thrones are invulnerable until the opposing team collects enough Ether. Ether is gained in a variety of ways, including destroying enemy team's flowers , killing enemy players, and other unique in game objects.

Gameplay is split between day and night cycles. During daytime players can focus on the lanes, where the flowers are active. At night the game opens up, with the flowers sleeping and neutral enemies spawning throughout the map.

You begin the game weak, slow, and pathetic. Yet by leveling up, earning gold, and buying upgraded skills, passive upgrades, and active items. By the end of a match you should feel like an endgame boss from you favorite games and lead your team to victory.
